code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{style:headerStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:brandWrapper,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/assets/GFX_logo.jpg",alt:"Millennial GFX Logo",style:logoStyle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:brandText,children:"Millennial GFX"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{style:navStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",style:navLink,children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",style:navLink,children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/services",style:navLink,children:"Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/portfolio",style:navLink,children:"Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",style:navLink,children:"Contact"})]})]});const headerStyle={backgroundColor:'#0a0a36',padding:'16px 32px',display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',borderBottom:'1px solid #1a1a4a'};const brandWrapper={display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:'10px',lineHeight:'1'};const logoStyle={width:'28px',height:'28px',objectFit:'contain'};const brandText={color:'#fff',fontSize:'1.25rem',fontWeight:'600'};const navStyle={display:'flex',gap:'24px'};const navLink={color:'#fff',textDecoration:'none',fontWeight:'500'};export default Header;
